- Walter has a descendant, Philip (Walter ← Philip).

- Sandra is an ancestor of Sara (Sandra ← Sara).
- Sara is connected to Terry through a long chain of descendants and ancestors (Sara ← Marilyn ← Tyler ← Emily ← Timothy ← Shirley ← Adam ← Amanda ← Eugene ← Diana ← Joe ← Benjamin ← Charles ← Katherine ← Hannah ← Janice ← Abigail ← Deborah ← Jordan ← Jacqueline ← Mason ← Anthony ← Kayla ← Jeffrey ← Noah ← Nancy ← Logan ← Ann ← Gregory ← Gerald ← Jacob ← Patricia ← Jeremy ← John ← Lauren ← Judith ← Brandon ← Natalie ← Brian ← Madison ← Kelly ← Theresa ← George ← Doris ← Joan ← Alexander ← Michelle ← Kathryn ← Bruce ← Joseph ← Jean ← Frank ← Christina ← Joshua ← Wayne ← Julia ← Nicole ← Catherine ← Steven ← Pamela ← Ryan ← Cynthia ← Carl ← Isabella ← Cheryl ← Russell ← Patrick ← Zachary ← Roy ← Megan ← Anna ← Elijah ← Dennis ← Charlotte ← Heather ← Andrew ← Nicholas ← William ← Lisa ← Randy ← Jennifer ← Brittany ← Amber ← Sean ← Vincent ← Susan ← Harold ← Laura ← Albert ← Linda ← Samuel ← Kyle ← Stephen ← Olivia ← Virginia ← Denise ← Martha ← Terry).

Thus, the correct relationship is that Scott and Terry share a common ancestor.
